# Highcharter

Este es un ejemplo del uso de librear√≠a highchart

```{r}
library(highcharter)

data(penguins, package="palmerpenguins")

hchart(penguins,"scatter",hcaes(x=flipper_length_mm,y=bill_length_mm,group=species))

```
